overview: Güney, who is an archaeologist, sets out for Sahilköy when he finds out that his father Salih wants to build a hotel in a historic area. Güney meets Derya, an activist from the village who is also against the construction of the hotel. Things get complicated for Salih, who is ready for any kind of deception, learns that his son is going to Sahilköy. Güney will be caught between his ex-girlfriend Seda, those who want treasure in the village, and those who want a hotel.
title: Love, Now!
